text: @NYGovCuomo Sir do you mind telling NewYorker's why at home death toll in NYC has gone up to 200 plus a day from 20-30. Why those people are not tested and declared as Covid19 deaths. If hospital will not accept patients unless you are dying. How could you see as hospitalization being down.
